C

Canvas - Class in gui
A class representing the canvas on the board on which tokens (players and weapons) are drawn.
Canvas() - Constructor for class gui.Canvas
 
Card - Class in items
A class representing a card that is held in a player's hand or in a triplet.
Card(String) - Constructor for class items.Card
 
Card(String, Image) - Constructor for class items.Card
Overloaded constructor for graphically displaying cards.
characterAt(int, int) - Method in class cluedo.Board
Gets the image for a player at a given location.
checkCards(List<Player>) - Method in class util.Tuple
Checks the player's card to see if they can refute a guess.
checkHand(Card) - Method in class cluedo.Player
Checks to see if the player's hand contains a card.
cluedo - package cluedo
 
containsPlayer(Player) - Method in class util.Tuple
Checks to see if a player's hand contains any of the cards in this triplet.
containsToken(Token) - Method in class location.Location
Checks to see if token is contained at this Location.
